title: How to get 1000 AP (without being Veigar)
body:
I was wondering how to get at least 1000 AP in a match?
I was thinking a {{item:3040}}+{{item:3042}}+{{item:3027}}+{{item:3089}}+{{item:3157}}?
would this work?
also could it be a legitimate build, like something you would use in a game preferably without stacking 3 or more of the same item?

replies.body:
Drop Muramana, it's not helping you get 1k AP (it gives 30 AP on the seraphs and that's it).

Seraphs, RoA, Rabadon's, Luden's, Zhonya's, Rylai's is going to be the biggest AP build.

170 AP, 100 AP, 120 AP, 100 AP, 100 AP, 100 AP

690AP + 41% (Raba's and Archmage) = 972 AP

Considering i haven't taken into account runes and mastery's, this means any mana bound champion can break 1k AP.

Seraphs is 170 AP because you can easily get 90 AP from the Mana you have built from RoA and the tear late game.

This said Seraph's, Raba's and 4 RoA's beats this once all RoA's are stacked because the Mana converts into AP (RoA is 800 Mana or 24 AP once fully stacked, and 12 AP/400 mana when 0 stacks on Seraph's).

If you want to farm 10-20 kills/assists without dying on a mage using such a build, and can actually manage to pull it off, then sure, Mejai's would increase your AP. However, it's less practical than any items Jason used in his example, for the very reason it's difficult, at best, to get the stacks needed in a **PVP** environment and actually keep them.

This basically.

You must keep 10 stacks or more at all times for it to remain viable to keep, and yeah good luck with that once people realize you have a mejai's.
You wont need that much ap on anyone but veigar
Or fizz... Or teemo... Or any cheeze ap guy maybe shaco?

Expanding on what JasonWazza said and taking into consideration items, runes, masteries and champion (without stacking items):

Items:
{{item:3040}} 80 AP (+3% of max mana)
{{item:3089}} 120 AP (+35%)
{{item:3027}} 60 AP (+40 when fully stacked)
{{item:3116}} 100 AP
{{item:3285}} 100 AP
{{item:3157}} 100 AP

Masteries:
Mental Force 6 AP
Arcane Mastery 16 AP
Archmage +5%

Runes:
3 Quints of Scaling AP 23.22 AP
9 Glyphs of Scaling AP 27.54
9 Marks of Scaling AP 16.2
9 Seals of Scaling AP 16.2

Using {{champion:38}} at level 18 (1537.6 mana)

Max mana is 3337.6 x 0.03 = 100.128 AP

180.128 *Seraph's* + 120 + (4 x 100) + 6 + 16 + 23.22 + 27.54 + (2 x 16.2) = 805.288
805.288 x 1.4175 *(Rabadon's with Archmage)* = 1142 AP

Keeping in mine this is using Kassadin, who has the highest base mana at level 18, and a rune page dedicated to AP. If you were to substitute Kassadin for Poppy (lowest base mana at level 18) and not use a full rune page it would be 990 AP, a bit short of 1000. You should be able to do it on most, if not all, mages without extreme difficulty.
Using AP items before change in recent patch, I was clearing 1200 AP on fiddle.
replace muramana with a fully satcked mejais and yes, you get about 1030 AP.
